title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes product listings, cart functionality, user authentication, and an admin panel.

title: Task Management App
description: A responsive task management application allowing users to create, organize, and track their tasks. Built with Vue.js and Firebase.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: The very website you are looking at! Built with React to showcase my projects and skills. Features dark mode and a clean UI.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A web application that displays current weather and forecasts for cities using a third-party weather API. Implemented with vanilla JavaScript.

title: Blog Engine
description: A lightweight blog engine developed with Python (Flask) and SQLite. Supports Markdown for posts and has a simple admin interface.

title: Data Visualization Tool
description: A tool for creating interactive charts and graphs from CSV data, using D3.js for powerful visualizations.

title: Recipe Finder
description: Search for recipes based on ingredients you have. Integrates with a recipe API. Built with Angular.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application using WebSockets (Socket.io) and Node.js for instant messaging.
